purpose: The email announces the 17th Symposium on Search-Based Software Engineering (SSBSE 2025) scheduled for November 16, 2025, in Seoul. It invites high-quality research submissions focusing on the role of AI and optimization in software engineering. Key topics include novel applications of SBSE, theoretical advances, empirical evaluations, industrial experiences, and integrations with AI and machine learning. Important dates for submissions and notifications are provided, along with a link for more information and submission guidelines. Accepted papers will be considered for a special journal issue in the Automated Software Engineering journal.

infos:

From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>

Content-Type:text/plain
